title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 320: Featuring Chris Thorburn + Professional Fan Cameron Hughes
description:
On Episode 320 of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Chris Thorburn and Cameron Hughes. Thorby joined (58:51) to discuss winning the Stanley Cup, playing with Whit and Biz, some hilarious pranks and a bunch more. The guys then break down all the recent NHL news, including Burkie/Hextall in PIttsburgh, the Canucks/Preds struggles, the Golden Knights golden buckets and tons more. We were then joined by professional fan Cameron Hughes (02:28:07) who joined to discuss why teams pay him to come dance in their arenas. The guys wrap up talking about Biz’s vacation, the Brittany Spears doc and much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
